p: Human astroglioma U251 cells were purchased from American Type Culture Collection (ATCC) (Manassas, VA, USA). Human embryonal rhabdomyosarcoma (RD) cells were obtained from the China Center for Type Culture Collection (CCTCC) (Wuhan, China). All cell lines were cultured in Dulbecco’s Modified Eagle Medium (DMEM) (Invitrogen, Carlsbad, CA), supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS; Gibco, Grand Island, NY), 100 U/ml penicillin, and 100 mg/ml streptomycin sulfate at 37°C in a 5% CO 2 incubator.
